metadata.title: Technical Appendix Supplementary material including additional methodology, results, and discussion. Additional Methods

abstract.original_text: Under the treatment only strategy, we considered the possibility that the treatment stockpiles may be limited. We analyzed the effect of varying the percentage of infected receiving treatment, on the outcome of peak absenteeism; for different R 0 . Under the prophylaxis strategies, we assumed that treatment stockpiles would be large enough to ensure sufficient treatment doses are available above those planned for use as prophylaxis.
